context.title: Societal Response
context.content:
This is a broad category of supportive content concerning implementation of all-of-society resilience, repurposing government, business continuity, and community services plans. This can include:

Early investigation protocols Guidance for COVID-19 in schools, workplaces and Institutions, Humanitarian operations, camps and other fragile settings Operational support and logistics Points of entry and mass gatherings Country-level coordination, planning, and monitoring More information on this broad category can be found here.
